title: Natural Language Understanding for Easy Communication
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to understand my varied speech patterns and accents so that I can easily communicate my needs and stay socially connected without frustration.

title: Voice-Activated Reminder Management
summary: As a retired social worker, I want to set reminders for my volunteering activities and medication through voice commands so that I can manage my busy schedule and stay on top of my health without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Contextual Information Retrieval for Task Management
summary: As a retired social worker, I want ALFRED to provide step-by-step guidance for managing my daily tasks like scheduling volunteering activities and maintaining social connections, so that I can easily navigate my busy schedule despite my reduced mobility and arthritis pain.

title: Voice Feedback and Confirmation
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive clear auditory feedback and confirmation when I complete tasks with ALFRED, so that I feel confident that my commands have been understood and executed correctly.

title: Error Handling and User Assistance – Recognizing and Addressing User Frustration
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to recognize when I am frustrated and provide helpful assistance so that I can continue using the system easily and without stress.

title: Personalized Interaction History
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to track my interactions and preferences so that I receive tailored suggestions for social connections and volunteering activities that suit my interests and needs.

title: Multimodal Interaction Support for Enhanced Communication
summary: As an older adult, I want to use both voice commands and visual cues to interact with ALFRED so that I can easily manage my communication and calendar without feeling overwhelmed by technology.

title: Adaptive Learning for Personalized Assistance
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to learn my preferences over time so that it can better assist me in managing my social connections, staying informed, and scheduling my volunteering activities.
